actions.full: I don't think that was it.
actions.title: I don't think that was it.
actions.short: I don't think that was it.

actions.full: You were alone on that moon?
actions.title: You were alone on that moon?
actions.short: You were alone on that moon?

actions.full: He's in Stand By Me, and his eyes are kinda weird.

actions.full: You were alone on that moon?

actions.short: You were alone on that moon?

actions.full: Folks are always looking for solid news on unicorn sightings, these days.

actions.full: You could probably start a cult.
actions.title: You could probably start a cult.
actions.short: You could probably start a cult.

actions.full: I have no idea what you're talking about.
actions.title: Slow down. Explain.

actions.full: This story sounds familiar. Are you... Taylor?
actions.title: Is this who I think it is?
actions.short: Is this who I think it is?

actions.full: Oh, yeah! Taylor! I know you!

actions.short: Oh, yeah! Taylor! I know you!

actions.full: Or do you mean actual ALIENS?

actions.short: Or do you mean actual ALIENS?

actions.full: The sort of place you'd have a summer home.
actions.title: Sounds dreamy.

actions.full: I mean, let's be honest, you were kind of whiny.
actions.title: Eh. Not that much.

actions.full: I mean, let's be honest, you were kind of whiny.
actions.title: Eh. Not that much.

actions.full: He's in Stand By Me, and his eyes are kinda weird.

actions.short: Kiefer Sutherland has creepy green eyes.

actions.full: Or something else man-made, like a probe?
actions.title: A satellite, maybe?

actions.full: If it wasn't made by humans... where did it come from?
actions.title: So, NOT man-made, then?

actions.full: Once you're back on Earth soil, maybe you'll feel safe again.
actions.title: Maybe once you're back home.

actions.full: Sounded like you were sleeping okay, until the klaxons went off.
actions.title: Sorry the alarm woke you.

actions.full: You're like a magpie of a human being, you know that?
actions.title: You're an idiot.

actions.full: There are other people on that ship. You don't have to rely on me for company.
actions.title: You're not alone out there.

actions.full: You're like a magpie of a human being, you know that?
actions.title: You're an idiot.

actions.full: Okay. Fine. So what's shiny now?
actions.title: Okay. Fine. So what's shiny now?
actions.short: Okay. Fine. So what's shiny now?

actions.full: There's all sorts of junk in space. No need to freak out.
actions.title: Maybe it's just a comet.

actions.full: You've seen some crazy crap. You're on edge. But you'll be fine.
actions.title: You're NOT dead. Relax.

actions.full: What does this thing look like?
actions.title: What does this thing look like?
actions.short: What does this thing look like?

actions.full: There were a few too many science words to follow in there.
actions.title: You lost me.

actions.full: Whatever this is, I'm sure the White Star crew can handle it.

actions.full: Do you think it's a ship?

actions.short: Do you think it's a ship?

actions.full: You're like a magpie of a human being, you know that?

actions.full: This sarcasm isn't helping you figure out what's closing in.

actions.full: Can the jokes; check the radar.

actions.full: How are they throwing you off course?

actions.title: All right. Go to the cockpit.

Wait, we get PAID to help you?

actions.full: With the alarm silenced, maybe you can get back to sleep.

actions.full: Cool. Tell me about the others.

actions.full: Maybe you guys can outfly them.

actions.full: Except one organism benefits while the other just maintains status quo.

actions.full: If this is making you uncomfortable, you don't have to listen.

actions.short: Yes. Go back and stop Artesa.
